website_summaries.verdict: The GT 2000 5 Trail is the off-road version of the regular model. With a trail-specific lug and tackier rubber in the outsole, it provides enough traction for less technical, rocky, or muddy trails. The shoe handles middle distance runs and daily training without trouble. It has superior comfort, good arch support, and a very breathable upper for those moderately fast or easy days on the trail.
pros: The comfort of the 5th version of the GT 2000 Trail was greatly appreciated by a moderate number of runners
It is a versatile trail shoe that can also handle the roads
The shoe is lighter than its predecessor
More than a handful were very satisfied with the GT 2000 5 Trail’s style
The use of seamless overlays on both sides of the shoe should lessen the risk of blisters
It is quite supportive, based on the comments of some runners
More than a handful were happy with this shoe’s traction on the trail and the road
A few reviewers commended the breathability of the latest version of the Asics GT 2000 5 Trail
cons: It feels a little stiffer compared to the prior model, according to a few runners
A handful deemed the price tag to be above its value

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, perfect for rough terrain and hiking!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fit and quality for hiking and rough terrain. Exactly as described, and very comfy / lightweight and snug on the feet. I personally did not need my orthotics with these, as the shoe itself provides enough stability for my mild - moderate over pronation. Very pleased all around! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Just a Hair on the Small Side
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice looking shoe but seemed to run just a bit smaller than all of my previous Asics. I ended up sending them back for that reason. I would still recommend, them, though, keeping in mind that you might need to go up 1/2 size. For reference, I typically wear a 9 in Asics (last pair Gel Cumulus) and ordered the same in this and my toe was just touching the end.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: ... for hiking our cross country path and they have amazing grip and are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I used these for hiking our cross country path and they have amazing grip and are very comfortable, right out of the box. ASICS are fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Sally A. Thorsell

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, rigid
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and look. Fits similar to my other asics, but I must say that the Trail Runner is much more rigid and less comfy than the regular GT-2000. I miss the comfort of those and would not buy the trail runner again. That said, if you are actually using these shoes for trail running, that might be perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy make look sturdy but they're not
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy. Have had them just over a month and they already have a hole in them and starting to fall apart. I have to buy shoes online big feet and my shoes I pick usually last as expected. At least 6 months these shoes will not. It has been years since I've picked shoes from online that didn't last as long as I expected my shoes to.
customer_reviews.author: book lover

customer_reviews.title: Buy a 1/2 Size up
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of the prior GT 2000s, all 7.5. I'm Asics Brand-loyal and am the same size in all of their shoes; however their sizing has changed with the GT 2000 5 where I needed a 1/2 size larger. Arch support dis not feel as significant either. Not impressed with the 'improved' shoe fit.
customer_reviews.author: MadisonJKitten

customer_reviews.title: Great fit every time!
customer_reviews.text: I love Asics. I never have to guess if I a buying the right size. I order the same size each time and they always fit exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kosmo Love

customer_reviews.title: Loud squeak when walking
customer_reviews.text: From the day I got these shoes they have squeaked when I walk in them. I have tried a number of different "hacks" to no avail. I would have returned them but a lot of comments stated it would go away as they were broken in ... not in my case. Still LOVE Asics...but not happy with this recent purchase. May have to take a break from them and try a new brand...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you've never bought trail running shoes - be warned ...
customer_reviews.text: If you've never bought trail running shoes - be warned - they don't have as much cushioning as normal running shoes. Fit the same as, if maybe a hair larger (to accomodate thicker socks) than my normal asics running shoes in size 10.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, well padded, good arch support....so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Marishka

customer_reviews.title: They run smaller than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: These are nice shoes - I ordered a half size larger than I normally wear which is suggested for hiking shoes. They are too small and I missed the deadline for returning. (Had a sick 96 year old mother). Order with care.
customer_reviews.author: Harleyjan99

customer_reviews.title: I loved these asics in gray and blue
customer_reviews.text: I loved these asics in gray and blue. They fit aa expected only because I ordered the next size up because the reviews said they ran small. I usually wear 8 1/2 but ordered 9. So, really I'm saying they run small. Great shoe and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Lacking durability
customer_reviews.text: ASICS quality/durability seems to be getting worse with time. I’ve worn similar-model ASICS running shoes for over 20yrs (why do they have to change every year???), but I think im finally going to find a new brand. Holes appeared by my pinkie toes and inside both heels the fabric/padding broke down, giving me blisters.
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Great for running
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I usually roll my ankle, but these offer enough support so that doesn't happen. They also offer a lot of cushion so my feet don't get as sore after a long run.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size larger than normal. A great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 3 pairs of asics running shoes. They are my favorite show to wear. Very supportive and comfortable. They do run a bit small so buy a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Toe box too narrow
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in ASICS,I’ve worn them since the 80’s but I can no longer find any style that is comfortable due to the narrowing of the toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name. running ed

customer_reviews.title: The shoe felt great but asics has messed the sizing up
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased no less than 20 pair of gt 2000s in my life. All have been a sz 8. As this was the first time I purchased a "trail shoe", I was excited. I read the reviews, which is an addiction for me, but did not listen to the many people who said this shoe ran small. Needless to say, they're on their way back to amazon world. Now I'm not sure if I should buy an 8.5 or a 9. The shoe felt great but asics has messed the sizing up. I'm 5 ft tall. I dot NOT wear a sz 9 shoe!
customer_reviews.author: kathy haynes

customer_reviews.title: This shoe runs small
customer_reviews.text: I wear this size with all my other shoes including asics. The shoes were fine quality wise but were too small so I ordered a different asics shoe.
customer_reviews.author: creeker

customer_reviews.title: She said she really liked
customer_reviews.text: Gift for our daughter-in-law. She said she really liked them
customer_reviews.author: E Hayden

customer_reviews.title: but I committed to the 8 and I'm really happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am a standard 8 in Asics and these did not differ from any other Asics shoe. I was nervous after reading other reviews indicating that people needed to order a half to one full size up, but I committed to the 8 and I'm really happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Asics run small, but this shoe is great! I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order half size larger
customer_reviews.text: Usually buy ASICS GT-2000, but not the trail version. It’s heavier and mine fit a little snug...
customer_reviews.author: Quietstrength

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe and value
customer_reviews.text: These were a great price and fit perfectly. Even my custom orthotics fit in just right. Perfect for walking/hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B. Safford

customer_reviews.title: Love Ascis sneaks
customer_reviews.text: Love Ascis sneaks. LOVE THEM. I'm a dogwalker, so these sneaks get beaten up everyday until I wear out the tread. Then I buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Hood

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, fit as expected and best brand of shoes for walking, running or daily shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Snug an my Achilles heal. I like that. And love the camo souls.
customer_reviews.author: dawn m jamison

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great trail shoe to use when I am overpronating, great for running, good for hiking, too
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable but run a little smaller than my other ASICS. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: I Value Anonymity

customer_reviews.title: Short-lived comfort
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes in terms of their comfort and the level of support they afford but they started developing holes on the inside heels after only two months which was disappointing. "They don't make 'em like they used to"
customer_reviews.author: sandy beach

customer_reviews.title: Small size
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1 full size like i did with kayanos but this runs small
customer_reviews.author: Juan J. Mejia

customer_reviews.title: They are loud. Makes noise when I walk. ...
customer_reviews.text: They are loud. Makes noise when I walk. Also, seem to run bigger than other ASICS of this style I've bought in the past.
customer_reviews.author: smare65

customer_reviews.title: ASICS
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is exactly what i expected. It is a very good walking shoe and is very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: R. BROWN

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Returned because I have overpronation and this shoe was suppose to help but it didn't have arch support.
customer_reviews.author: DMS

customer_reviews.title: ... this is the first pair I have been really disappointed with. The back of my right shoe tore ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Asics for many years and this is the first pair I have been really disappointed with. The back of my right shoe tore out after approx. 1 month of wearing. They were extremely comfortable and loved them initially but the quality was lacking and for what they cost they should have stood up longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping they ran true like my other ASICS
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping they ran true like my other ASICS, but these run a little short. I like toe space. :)
customer_reviews.author: B20122

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and they hold up better than the GT-2000 4.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves Asics Gel shoes!! So do I!! Wish they had more colors and types for Men!!
customer_reviews.author: TVK

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: With ASICS if you wear a 7 you will at least need a 7.5.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: If both shoes fit like the left
customer_reviews.text: The right shoe did not fit the same as the left shoe. If both shoes fit like the left, I would have kept them, but unfortunately I had to return them because the right was way too tight across the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Elly S.

customer_reviews.title: durable and happy over all with product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for running. I run 5 miles a day and am very satisfied with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Gravely

customer_reviews.title: TOO narrow even with larger size
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, HATE how it fit. The ASICS newest GT-2000 editions/models have gotten much narrower. I even ordered a half size larger than my usual. They were fine for about 3 hours of mostly sitting, but after standing for a while they were painfully tight and I had to have my old shoes brought to work so I could switch back. It's hard to find a running shoe that has good (not neon) colors and I really wish I could find them in a wider fit. :(
customer_reviews.author: Loquacious_Pharmer

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect when I put them on
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect when I put them on. Didn't have to break them in. Great support on arches and heels
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th or 6th pair of these I've had. Very durable and great if you have a tendency to prodnicate.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mangum

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the same size I wear in every other pair of Asics, and they were way too small!!
customer_reviews.author: lleek

customer_reviews.title: crappy quality way to small
customer_reviews.text: crappy quality way to small. Not normal for asics. Bummed, stuck with a crappy shoe that is too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Toe base has begun to separate on both left and right shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Hasselquist

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Very supportative. I felt that I got a great price on a great pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Smith

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I'm an 8.5, my feet are not wide but these sneakers are VERY narrow. Sadly I have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe so much!!! My favorite asics shoe thus far. Nice and supportive but I do wish it came in narrow. I will just continue to tie it super tight for now.
customer_reviews.author: Katieasaur

customer_reviews.title: Shoes attractive but too narrow and therefore useless for their purpose
customer_reviews.text: The toe box for this shoe is too narrow. I read all the reviews, did a lot of research, and got a pair a size larger than my normal shoes. I normally wear narrow running shoes, so I thought these would be okay despite other complaints about this issue. My toe was hitting uncomfortably for running shoes, but I didn't want to go through the hassle of returning without being sure, and kept checking the shoes out inside with different socks, and now come back to the site seeking a different pair, only to find out the return window is closed. There's no reason why running shoes should be so unpredictable. Return window too narrow for a purchase like this.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but not true to size. Reordered in a larger size. Reordered but again the shoe did not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of Asics GT series all in the same size, fit has always been consistent. These were too small. I was disappointed because I liked the colors for winter. I returned them, not because of quality, but possibly just a size tagging issue.
customer_reviews.author: Cerena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Favorite pair of tennis shoes I have had! Very good support and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kati Besler

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe but was too small. I went with the asics duomax. And it fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This shoes feel great. They are a replacement for ones previously recommended to me through an xray of my feet and stance.
customer_reviews.author: DottieF

product_meta.title: ASICS Women's GT-2000 5 Trail Runner
product_meta.description: The GT-2000 5 trail shoe is designed for the higher mileage runner looking to take their run to the trails with the perfect balance of structured cushioning and protection. A rugged outsole with a deep lug pattern provide great traction while running on trails. Our tight weave mesh upper keeps dirt and debris out of the interior, while the guidance Trusstic system® technology allows runners seeking maximum stability to pursue the ultimate off-road adventure.
feature_bullets: fuzeGEL Midsole: ASICS new GEL cushioning technology made from the fusion of GEL and foam creates lightweight comfort, tuned to provide rearfoot shock absorption that shifts to forefoot bounce back.
FluidRide Midsole: FluidRide provides the ultimate combination of bounce back and cushioning properties with reduced weight and exceptional durability.
Dynamic DuoMax Support System: This evolution of DuoMax system enhances stability and support, with reduced weight and increased platform support.
Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning Systems: Attenuates shock during impact and toe-off phases, and allows movement in multiple planes as the foot transitions through the gait cycle.
Guidance Trusstic System Technology: This Trusstic System integrates Guidance Line construction for enhanced gait efficiency while providing midfoot structural integrity.
